tab1.title1: Welcome to Yggdrasil Gaming Community Ark:SA Cluster
tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.White>We really hope you enjoy playing on our servers.
Please make sure you read our rules using the button below before playing.
Also please join Discord using the link button on the bottom of the screen.
 Our PVE servers have Plugins installed. You get free shop points from voting. Also points are gained each hour of playtime. You can use these points to purchase kits from the F2 store. To learn more about this use the 'Chat Commands' button in the top left to read about the commands available. Make sure to vote daily on all servers after clicking the VOTE button below. Then use the /claim in Global Chat to claim your points and materials. Once you save enough points they can be used to purchase things in the ingame F2 store such as items and Boss tribute packs. You also get a lot of free materials and Hexagons from voting daily.
Our servers are supported by donations from the community. We like to say a big thankyou to members of our community that donate and become VIP members with some rewards and benefits. If you would like to donate or want to know more about donating then please click the DONATE button below which will take you to our donation store.

We hope you enjoy playing on our servers and being a part of the community :) </>
